name: Cygnus Enterprises
description:
Cygnus Enterprises combines action RPG, sandbox, and base management elements, and is set on the alien frontier world of Mytilus.
FAST-PACED ACTION SHOOTER RPG
Battle hostile alien creatures and shoot your way through exotic locations.

BUILD AND MANAGE YOUR BASE
Gather resources, construct buildings, and research new technologies. Entice new settlers to visit, live, and work on your base. Manage your employees to ensure prosperity and happiness.

LOOT, CRAFT AND TRADE
Gear up your character with hundreds of unique items, including more than 50 weapons.

BE WHO YOU WANT TO BE
Customize your appearance and choose skills freely from six distinct skill trees.
